data.title: Modern British Dining – OXO Tower Restaurant – OXO Tower
data.meta_description: OXO Tower Restaurant is perfect for every occasion. Enjoy lunch, dinner & afternoon tea with unparalleled views of London’s Skyline. Book a table now.
data.text:
FENNEL AND ELDERFLOWER BELLINI Tanqueray 10, homemade fennel cordial, St Germain, lemon juice, topped with

soda and a drop of absinthe. 15

SMOKED CHERRY OLD FASHIONED Bulleit bourbon, a touch of smoky single malt and cherry liqueur, stirred over

ice with sugar, Angostura and orange bitters. Served over ice in the finest rocks

glass. 15.5

LYCHEE AND COCONUT COLLINS Citadelle Gin, lychee puree, coconut syrup, Cointreau, shaken over ice with

lemon juice and garnished with lemon zest.bitters then topped up with the classic Moët Brut Champagne. Finished with a

suspicion of orange zest. 15

SPICED HONEY MANHATTAN Makers Mark bourbon stirred with Cocchi Americano vermouth and

Ardbeg 10 year-old. Finished with a hint of house infused chilli honey.

(contains SULPHITES) 15

OXO CHAMPAGNE COCKTAIL Harvey Nichols x Hine cognac, infused with orange zest, vanilla and a touch

of bitters then topped up with the Harvey Nichols Champagne. Finished with a

suspicion of orange zest. (contains SULPHITES). 16.5

POPCORN PUNCH A hearty slug of Plantation 3* rum, OXO’s very own popcorn and vanilla

flavoured milk, pineapple juice, peach puree and a dash of lime shaken with

ice and strained into a rocks glass. Garnished with a pineapple crisp and a little

more popcorn for good measure. 15

LEMON VERBENA VESPER Grey Goose Vodka infused with lemon verbena leaves, Roku Gin, shaken with

Cocchi Americano and homemade nettle cordial. Finished with a twist of zest.

(contains SULPHITES) 15

GREEN APPLE SOUR Ketel One Vodka, muddled Granny Smith apple core, Amaretto, green

Chartreuse, finished with a hint of vanilla and lime juice. Shaken over ice and

strained in to a frozen Nick and Nora. Garnish with an apple crisp 15

SMOKED CUCUMBER & PINEAPPLE Mezcal combined with Ancho Reyes chilli liqueur, pineapple,

lime and muddled cucumber. Served ridiculously chilled and garnished

with crispy pineapple. 19

NETTLE GIMLET Citadelle Jardin D’été gin, mixed with homemade nettle cordial,

St Germain and lemon juice. 15

RHUBARB PALOMA Mijenta tequila mixed with homemade rhubarb syrup, grapefruit juice and dry

vermouth. Shaken with lime juice then strained and served over ice. Topped with

lemonade. (contains SULPHITES) 19
